Goal Representation: ['1. Find the remote control.', '2. Turn on the TV using the remote control.']

def is_remote_control_observed(remote_control:item):
    # Function to check if the remote control has been observed
    symbol observed=visited(remote_control)
    return observed

behavior find_remote_control(remote_control:item):
    body:
        if not is_remote_control_observed(remote_control):
            observe(remote_control, "Check if this is the remote control and its location")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        # Select the remote control
        
        if not is_remote_control_observed(remote_control):
            find_remote_control(remote_control)
